# GroupSessionMessenger.MessageContext

**Structure**

A structure that contains additional information about an incoming message, such as which device sent it.

## Declaration

```swift
struct MessageContext
```

## Getting the initiating participant

- **source**: The participant device that sent the message.

## Receiving data from other participants

- **messages(of:)**: Returns the asynchronous sequence of messages that contain a generic data object.
- **messages(of:)**: Returns the asynchronous sequence of messages that match the app-specific type.
- **GroupSessionMessenger.Messages**: An asynchronous sequence of messages sent to the session.

## Conforms To

- Sendable
- SendableMetatype

items.description: The participant device that sent the message.
items.name: source

items.description: Returns the asynchronous sequence of messages that contain a generic data object.
